items.raw_desc: Póttabletta ORION ND tabletta 832375-be, 450 g 3+1:The ORION 832375 humidity absorber cartridge is a universal tablet that fits into commercially available dehumidifiers, where it draws moisture from the air and accumulates it in a reservoir. It is widely used not only in apartments, but also in cottages, garages or cellars. The air in the absorber flows around the tablet, making dehumidification even more efficient. The tablet gradually reduces its effectiveness and shrinks - after exhausting their effects, it is necessary to replace it with a new one. The shelf life of the tablet depends on the size of the room and the humidity in the room where the dehumidifier is located.
